snippet: SoundExchange, the organization that collects royalties from satellite and Internet radio services, said on Thursday that it paid $462 million to performers and record companies last year, up 58 percent from 2011.
abstract: SoundExchange, the organization that collects royalties from satellite and Internet radio services, said on Thursday that it paid $462 million to performers and record companies last year, up 58 percent from 2011.

headline.main: Digital Notes: Measuring Growth in Dollars and Page Views
